pull.title: build: Update univalue subtree
pull.body:
Just a minor bugfix: Currently we don't push booleans into arrays, but if we did they'd be pushed as integers.

Can be tested by reverting the diff in `include/` and observing a test failure.

issue.title: build: Update univalue subtree
issue.body:
Also implements https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12193 to fix compilation errors.

> This removes the deprecated `std::pair` wrappers from univalue, so that they are not accidentally re-introduced in our code base.
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14164

> Performance improvement.
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17324

> Security
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18099

 > Bugfixes
Ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20424
